titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation appointing a time of publick thanksgiving and prayer throughout the kingdom.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: By the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head of text.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the 23rd day of December, 1687. In the third year of Our Reign.
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
Proclamation to announce thanksgiving for the pregnancy of Queen Mary.
